planning.title: Planning
planning.no_items_under_category: There are no items under this category yet.

list.title: List
list.no_list: You do not have an active list connected. Please create a new one or connect an existing list.

share.title: Share your list
share.information: You can share your list with a partner or a friend by sending them the following URL, or press the share button if available.
share.send_message: Someone want's to share their shopping list with you on Milk & Eggs. Click the link to start sharing!

share.title: Sharing is caring
share.information: Someone has offered to share a list with you.
share.warning_message: You already have an existing list. You can only use one list at a time. Are you sure you want to replace the list with this shared list?
share.deny_settings: No, I'll create my own list instead
